channel.title: Reverse Proxy on
channel.description: Recent content in Reverse Proxy on

item.title: Project Golden Gate
item.description: Overview This is an outline for a project I’m working on. I’ll post updates as I progress. Golden Gate aims to be a transparent reverse proxy that sits on the border of a network. It will handle all web requests coming into the newtork and pass them to the appropriate server. Except for Golden Gate, nothing will be open to the Internet in general. Golden Gate aims to provide
